is it possible to put into words my love

how my fingers yearn to express that
which can find no expression for the

ye by and eat yay come buy wine and milk

his love leaves with a me like an eagle

bubbling forth from within me like the

say come and let him that hears say come
and let him that is a first cup and
whosoever will let him take the water of

the treasured storehouses more

possible oh how his love consumes me
raging through me get also quietly
pouring in stillwater delight the enemy
here is your love as a cacophony like a

your love is sweet still and soft yet it

cannot even with the gift of words
you've given me do justice to your most

hold it close to your bosom for it is
all I can offer up though meteor it is

oh the love of the great I am made and
fold within the hearts of my readers
